entry.title: THINAI MURUKKU -திணை முறுக்கு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 210.00

This murukku is made with thinai (foxtail millet) flour, besan, and rice flour, seasoned with ajwain and cumin. It’s crispy, savory, and a delicious option for guilt-free snacking.

INGREDIENTS 

Thinai flour, roasted gram flour, rice flour, besan flour, ajwain, cumin, salt, rice bran oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: RAGI MURUKKU-ராகி முறுக்கு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 210.00

Our Ragi Murukku is a wholesome, crispy snack made with ragi (finger millet) flour, besan, and roasted gram flour. Flavored with sesame, cumin seeds, and red chili powder, it’s a crunchy snack that’s perfect for health-conscious individuals.

INGREDIENTS 

Ragi Flour, besan flour, roasted gram flour, red chilli powder, urad dhal, Sesame, salt, ajwain, cumin seeds, rice bran oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: VARAGU THINAI MIXTURE-வரகு தினை மிக்சர்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 200.00

This millet-based mixture combines the goodness of varagu (kodo millet) and thinai (foxtail millet) flours with peanuts, green gram, and crunchy rice flakes. Flavored with spices and masala, it’s a unique and healthy snack option.

INGREDIENTS 

Thinai flour, besan flour, salt, turmeric powder, Varagu flour, red chilli powder, asafoetida, pepper, flat rice, peanut, green gram, garlic, rice bran oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: SAAMAI DAL MIXTURE -சாமை மிக்சர்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 220.00

Saamai Dal Mixture is a savory blend of little millet (saamai) flour, besan, and various lentils. Seasoned with a delicious mix of spices and curry leaves, it’s a crunchy, flavorful snack with added nutritional benefits from millets.

INGREDIENTS 

Saamai flour, besan flour, salt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, asafoetida, pepper, peanut, green gram, chick Peas, Cashew, green Peas, garlic, curry leaf, ride bran oil, masala

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: VARAGHU CHILLI SEV-வரகு கார சேவு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 190.00

For those who enjoy fiery snacks, Varaghu Chilli Sev is a must-try. Made with varagu (kodo millet), besan, and rice flours, this sev is spiced with red chili powder, garlic, and cumin. A crispy snack that delivers a delicious spicy kick.

INGREDIENTS 

Varagu flour, besan flour, rice flour, salt, turmeric powder, cumin seeds, pepper, red chilli powder, ajwain, garlic, rice bran oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: THINNAI PEPPER SEV-திணை மிளகு சேவு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 210.00

Our Thinai Pepper Sev combines the benefits of thinai (foxtail millet) flour with chickpea and rice flours, seasoned with bold spices like pepper, ajwain, garlic, and cumin. It’s a crispy, savory snack packed with flavor and nutrition.

INGREDIENTS 

Thinai flour, kadalai flour, rice flour, salt, turmeric powder, cumin seeds, pepper, ajwain, green Chilli, garlic,  rice bran oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: VARAGHU BOONDHI-வரகு பூந்தி
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type:
Price: 210.00

A perfect snack for spice lovers, our Varaghu Boondhi is made from besan (gram) flour, rice flour, and crunchy peanuts. This savory snack is flavored with red chili powder, pepper, and salt, making it an irresistible option for teatime or anytime.

INGREDIENTS 

Besan flour, rice flour, peanut, rice bran oil, Chilli powder, pepper powder, salt

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 Days Validity

entry.title: THINAI CORN MIXTURE-தினை கார்ன் மிக்சர்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norukus
Type: Veg
Price: 190.00

DESCRIPTION

Made with thinai flour, besan, peanuts, and corn, this crunchy mixture is a delightful combination of textures and flavors. It’s spiced with red chili, garlic, and a special masala blend, making it a great snack for any occasion.

INGREDIENTS

Thinai flour, besan flour, turmeric powder, salt, red chilli powder, asafoetida, pepper, garlic, peanut, corn, rice bran oil, masala

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 days
